event.name: Large waves along the Indian Ocean coast of Tanzania.
event.description: Large waves are expected along the Indian Ocean coastal areas. Likelihood of occurrence is HIGH and expected Impacts are HIGH. The expected impacts of this phenomenon are challenge to some of marine activities like marine navigation, fishery, recreational and associated impacts.

message.headline: RED WARNING. Large waves along the Indian Ocean coast of Tanzania
message.instruction: Sea users are advised TO TAKE AN IMMEDIATE ACTION. TMA will continue to monitor the situation and issue updates when necessary.

area.description: Coasts of Mtwara, Lindi, Pwani, Dar es salaam, Tanga, Unguja and Pemba islands
